entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Rankin Inlet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:50 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -41.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rankin Inlet Airport 4:21 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -41.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -61
Dewpoint: -45.4°C
Wind: N 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow at times. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 43. Wind chill near minus 65. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 35.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow at times. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 62 in the morning and minus 52 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
